title: Will iOS 19 redesign look more like visionOS? [The CultCast]
description: This week on Cult of Mac's podcast: We might see a big iOS 19 redesign based on the look and feel of visionOS, starting with Camera app. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Lewis Wallace
excerpt: This week on Cult of Mac's podcast: We might see a big iOS 19 redesign based on the look and feel of visionOS, starting with Camera app.
text: News The iOS overhaul might start with the Camera app. Image: Cult of Mac This week on Cult of Mac’s podcast: Is 2025 the year we see a big iOS 19 redesign based on the look and feel of visionOS? A new rumor says so, starting with the Camera app. There’s much to discuss! Also on The CultCast: Erfon finally made a decision on what size iPad Pro to buy. We discuss the latest rumors about the upcoming iPhone SE and iPad Air models. Apple takes steps to eliminate AI-generated fake news from notification summaries. But the company seems more intent than ever on getting everyone to use Apple Intelligence. Here are the headlines we’re talking about on this week’s show: iOS 19’s Camera app might receive visionOS-inspired revamp iPhone SE 4 might avoid Apple’s screen notch iPad Air with quicker M3 chip appears imminent iOS 18.3 will nuke bogus notification summaries for news stories Apple seems determined we use its new artificial intelligence features
html:
• News

This week on Cult of Mac’s podcast: Is 2025 the year we see a big iOS 19 redesign based on the look and feel of visionOS? A new rumor says so, starting with the Camera app. There’s much to discuss!

Also on The CultCast:

  • Erfon finally made a decision on what size iPad Pro to buy.
  • We discuss the latest rumors about the upcoming iPhone SE and iPad Air models.
  • Apple takes steps to eliminate AI-generated fake news from notification summaries. But the company seems more intent than ever on getting everyone to use Apple Intelligence.

Listen to this week’s episode of The CultCast in the Podcasts app or your favorite podcast app. (Be sure to subscribe and leave us a review if you like it!) Or watch the video live stream, embedded below.

The CultCast live stream archive: iOS 19 redesign?

Our sponsor: Squarespace

Squarespace: Easily create a beautiful website all by yourself, at squarespace.com/cultcast. The new guided design system Squarespace Blueprint makes it easier than ever to create a professional-looking layout and build a unique online presence from the ground up, tailored to your brand or business and optimized for every device. Use offer code CultCast at checkout to get 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

This week’s top Apple news

On the show this week: Your host Erfon Elijah (@erfon), Cult of Mac managing editor Lewis Wallace (@lewiswallace) and Cult of Mac writer D. Griffin Jones (@dgriffinjones).

Here are the headlines we’re talking about on this week’s show:

  • iOS 19’s Camera app might receive visionOS-inspired revamp
  • iPhone SE 4 might avoid Apple’s screen notch
  • iPad Air with quicker M3 chip appears imminent
  • iOS 18.3 will nuke bogus notification summaries for news stories
  • Apple seems determined we use its new artificial intelligence features
